Question: NINGBO CARELINE ELECTRIC APPLIANCE CO.,LTD. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
NINGBO CARELINE ELECTRIC APPLIANCE CO., LTD.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

 - Dominant in the air fryer market with ≥35% global share
 - Incorporates an OLED interactive screen with one-button display knob
 - Customizable screen information through an accompanying app
 - Features Xiao AI's voice control for hands-free, intelligent cooking
 - Focuses on IoT platform for advanced connectivity and smart appliance integration
